Really looking forward to our 4th annual Northern Voice! And to some great ideas and speaker submissions!
From Northern Voice 2008: <p>QUOTE</p> <blockquote> The Moose is Loose in 2008! </blockquote> <blockquote> Want to speak or lead a discussion? Then fill out the speaker submission form (speaker submissions close Monday December 10). </blockquote> <blockquote> Got an idea for a topic or discussion but don't feel like speaking on it or leading a discussion? Then check out our Call for Ideas (we've seeded the list with two initial ideas: microblogging and mobile blogging but these are just examples!) and add your own idea and rate others' ideas! </blockquote> <p>END QUOTE</p>
